src.desc: Path to image (unless a 'media' slot is used)

default.desc: Default slot can be used for content that gets displayed on top of the component

content.desc: Scoped slot for describing content that gets displayed on top of the component; If specified, it overrides the default slot

percentScrolled.desc: Percentage (0.0 < x < 1.0) of scroll in regards to QParallax

percentage.desc: Number between 0.0 and 1.0 defining the scrolled percentage of the component
